i18n.title: Check if a List Includes All Values
i18n.description: In Python, you can check if all the elements in one list are included in another list. This can be useful in many situations, such as verifying if a user's input matches a list of valid options. In this challenge, you will create a function that checks if all the values in a given list are included in another list.

meta.title: Python | List Inclusion Check
meta.description: Learn how to check if all values in one list are included in another list using Python. Useful for validating user input against a list of valid options.

steps.title: Check if a List Includes All Values

verify.name: Verify Includes All Python Script Execution
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 检查一个列表是否包含所有值
i18n.description: 在Python中，你可以检查一个列表中的所有元素是否都包含在另一个列表中。这在许多情况下都很有用，例如验证用户输入是否与有效选项列表匹配。在这个挑战中，你将创建一个函数，用于检查给定列表中的所有值是否都包含在另一个列表中。

meta.title: Python | 列表包含检查
meta.description: 学习如何使用Python检查一个列表中的所有值是否都包含在另一个列表中。这对于根据有效选项列表验证用户输入很有用。
meta.keywords: Python, 列表, 包含, 检查, 验证
